document_data.name: Delon
document_data.mainbody:
'''Delon''' was a child messenger from the village of [[Imnesvale (town)|Imnesvale]] in the [[Umar Hills]] of [[Amn]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''By the pits of the Abyss! Ye've agreed to run off into th' bloody forest on the whinings of a whelp, have ye? Have ye lost yer senses? Bah!''|[[Korgan]]}}
document_data.Description: Fael was a meek and stuttering [[human]] boy. He had light skin and dark brown hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, Delon was sent to [[Athkatla]] by the people of Imnesvale to bring back help in dealing with the recent deaths and disappearances. During his travels, Delon was met with cruel and mean people, had all of his [[coin]] stolen, and was left desperate to find an adventurer or two to take back to the Umar Hills. The child talked about missing people, folk going mad, some being found turned inside out, strange beasts seen skulking around, and even stories of the [[Umar Witch]] herself returning to torture the village. Subsequently, Delon may have came across [[Abdel Adrian]] and his companions and asking them to travel to the Umar Hills.
